name: Biman Bangladesh Full Flight | McDonnell Douglas DC-10 | Final DC10 Passenger Flight
description:
A full length, full flight video in real time onboard Biman Bangladesh Airlines Douglas DC10 S2-ACR, operating the last ever passenger carrying flight of the McDonnell Douglas DC10 from Birmingham on 24 February 2014.  The flight, operated by Biman Bangladesh Airlines DC-10-30 S2-ACR from Birmingham (BHX), was arranged for enthusiasts and people involved in the history of this magnificent aircraft to have the opportunity to fly on her one last time before she is scrapped in Bangladesh.

The video includes the full flight including pushback, taxi, takeoff, the cruise and landing back at Birmingham, as well as a water canon salute as we taxied onto stand.  As you will see the flight was mostly spent by people savouring every inch of this marvellous aircraft, with not a lot of sightseeing being done!

The flight attracted a great deal of media interest and there were numerous TV crews on the flight and on the ground to broadcast our arrival live.

Window shots are taken from seat 15A.

Please comment/subscribe!

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
